packageDetails.overview: Discover the city of firsts and experience the thrill of adventure. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of Dubai, where high-rise buildings, luxury cuisines, exciting activities, and captivating city views await you. Book this affordable 5-day Dubai tour and make memories that will last a lifetime.
inclusions: Pick-up and drop-off at the designated times
Visit to the 124th floor of Burj Khalifa
All tours and transfers by shared car are included
exclusions: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions

cancelationPolicy: 30 or more days before departure: 50% refund
Between 29 and 15 days before departure: full refund

termsAndConditions: The suggested itinerary is just a guide and can be changed by our local transporter at any time.
Flight prices are subject to availability at the time of booking and may vary. The actual flight price may differ from the package price.
Children under 2 years are included in the land package but will be charged separately for the flight ticket.
The mentioned rates are just a offer. If there is a change in the number of passengers, the rates may change based on the final number of passengers with the updated price available.
Please double-check the quotation for all requested options in the inclusions.
We recommend upgrading the hotels to your preference and the star rating category.

dayWiseItinerary.title: Arrival in Dubai - Dhow Cruise
dayWiseItinerary.description: Arrive at Dubai International Airport and check-in to your hotel or resort. Enjoy a delicious dinner on the Dhow Cruise, featuring stunning views of Dubai Creek and luxurious buildings.

dayWiseItinerary.title: Dubai City Tour - Visit to the 124th Floor of Burj Khalifa
dayWiseItinerary.description: Start your day with a delicious breakfast and embark on a thrilling sightseeing tour of Dubai. Explore iconic attractions, architectural marvels, and witness the breathtaking views of the city. End the tour with a visit to the 124th floor of Burj Khalifa, offering a panoramic view of the city.

dayWiseItinerary.title: Desert Safari
dayWiseItinerary.description: Start the day with a sumptuous breakfast and embark on an exciting desert safari, immersing yourself in the stunning sand dunes.

activities: Visit to the 124th Floor of Burj Khalifa
